__MSG_button_Advanced_Options__.description: Label on button to toggle showing 'Advanced Options'

__MSG_button_Apply_Changes__.description: Label on button to end manually editing list of URLs to fetch

__MSG_button_Clear_Url__.description: Label on button to erase the Cover Image URL text

__MSG_button_Edit_Chapter_Urls__.description: Label on button to allow manually editing list of URLs to fetch

__MSG_button_error_Cancel__.description: Label on 'Cancel' button when show error

__MSG_button_error_Skip__.description: Label on 'Skip' button when show error

__MSG_button_error_OK__.description: Label on 'OK' button when show error

__MSG_button_error_Retry__.description: Label on 'Retry' button when show error

__MSG_button_Help__.description: Label on button launch help page

__MSG_button_load_and_analyse__.description: Label on button to try loading url given by 'Starting URL'

__MSG_button_Pack_EPUB__.description: Label on button to create the EPUB

__MSG_button_Reset__.description: Label on button that clears the dialog

__MSG_button_Reset_stylesheet__.description: Label on button to remove all changes to stylesheet and set to default value

__MSG_button_Reverse_Chapter_Urls_Order_.description: Label on button to change order of chapters from last to first

__MSG_button_Select_All__.description: Label on button to set all chapters to selected

__MSG_button_Unselect_All__.description: Label on button to unselect all chapters

__MSG_column_Include__.description: The 'include this chapter' checkbox column in the table of chapters.

__MSG_column_Title__.description: The 'name of chapter' column in the table of chapters.

__MSG_column_URL__.description: The 'URL to get chapter frorm' column in the table of chapters.

__MSG_label_Advanced_Options_Visible_By_.description: Label for checkbox to make Advanced Options visible when UI opens

__MSG_label_Author__.description: Label in front input for novel's Author

__MSG_label_Auto_Parser_Select_Includes_.message: Automatic parser select includes Baka-Tsuki Series Page Parser
__MSG_label_Auto_Parser_Select_Includes_.description: Label for checkbox to toggle logic that picks parser to use for a web page to include the Baka-Tsuki Series Page Parser

__MSG_label_Chapter_Count__.description: Label for number of chapters in range

__MSG_label_Chapters_Page_In_Chapters_Li.message: Add Page with Chapters to Chapters List
__MSG_label_Chapters_Page_In_Chapters_Li.description: Label for checkbox to toggle adding the page with chapters to list of pages to fetch

__MSG_label_Cover_from_URL__.description: Label for checkbox to toggle between picking cover image from list or with a URL

__MSG_label_Cover_Image_URL__.description: Label for input to give cover image as URL

__MSG_label_Create_Epub_3__.description: Label for checkbox to choose between EPUB 2 and 3

__MSG_label_File_Author_as__.description: Label in front of input for author's name should be filed (in Advanced settings).

__MSG_label_Element_With_Chapter_Content.description: Label in front input for type of element holding each chapter's content

__MSG_label_Filename__.description: Label in front input for file to save EPUB as

__MSG_label_Developer_Stuff__.description: Label for checkbox to show/hide buttons for developer testing (in Advanced settings).

__MSG_label_Fetch_Highest_Resolution_Ima.description: Label for checkbox to get EPUB to include highest resolution images available (in Advanced settings).

__MSG_label_Include_URL_of_Images__.description: Label for checkbox to record source URL of images into EPUB (in Advanced settings).

__MSG_label_Language__.description: Label in front input for language EPUB will be in

__MSG_label_Manually_Select_Parser__.description: Label for menu to change parser (in advanced options section)

__MSG_label_Max_pages_to_fetch_simultane.message: Max web pages to fetch simultaneously
__MSG_label_Max_pages_to_fetch_simultane.description: Label for drop down for maximum number of web pages to request at same time

__MSG_label_Range_End_Chapter__.description: Label in front of drop down for selecting last chapter to include in epub

__MSG_label_Range_Start_Chapter__.description: Label in front of drop down for selecting first chapter to include in epub

__MSG_label_Remove_Author_Notes__.description: Label for checkbox to remove Author Notes from chapters

__MSG_label_Remove_Original__.description: Label for checkbox to remove Original text from chapters

__MSG_label_Remove_Duplicate_Images__.description: Label for checkbox to remove duplicate images from gallery (in cover images section)

__MSG_label_Remove_Superscript_From_Alte.description: Label for checkbox to convert superscripted alternate translations into inline text

__MSG_label_Series__.description: Label in front input for series Novel is part of

__MSG_label_Stylesheet__.description: Label in front of edit field for setting the stylesheet (in Advanced settings).

__MSG_label_Title__.description: Label in front of input for Novel's title.

__MSG_label_Translator__.description: Label in front of input for Translator (in Advanced settings).

__MSG_label_Use_SVG_for_Images__.description: Label in front of checkbox to choose between and

__MSG_label_Volume__.description: Label in front of input for novel's position in series.

__MSG_label_Write_Error_History_To_File_.description: Label for checkbox to write recent error messages to file

__MSG_option_Class_Is__.description: Content is element of specified class.

__MSG_option_Class_Starts_With__.description: Content is element having a class name starting with.

__MSG_option_First_Found__.description: Content is first element of specified type found.

__MSG_option_ID_Is__.description: Content is element with specified ID.

__MSG_option_ID_Starts_With__.description: Content is element having an ID starting with.

__MSG_Searching_For_URLs_Please_Wait__.description: Message shown while looking for list of Chapter URLs.

__MSG_Shift_Click__.message: You can select or unselect a range of chapters by clicking on the checkbox for the first chapter, then  hold down the shift key and click the last chapter in the range.
__MSG_Shift_Click__.description: Tell user how to shift-click to multiselect.

convertToXhtmlWarning.message: Warning, unable to convert chapter '$chapter$' from '$url$' to valid XHTML. Your epub viewer may fail when viewing that chapter. You may need to fix the chapter manually with Calibre.
convertToXhtmlWarning.description: Warning message when try to fetch an image and instead get HTML

defaultAuthor.description: Default author value to use when one is not supplied

defaultTitle.description: Default UUID value to use when one is not supplied

defaultUUID.description: Default UUID value to use when one is not supplied

errorContentNotFound.message: Could not find content element for web page '$url$'.
errorContentNotFound.description: Warning message when can't find content element for a web page

errorIllegalFileName.message: Filename '$filename$' must not contain the following characters: $illegalCharacters$
errorIllegalFileName.description: Warning message when filename isn't legal

gotHtmlExpectedImageWarning.message: Fetch of URL '$url$' returned HTML, expected an image.
gotHtmlExpectedImageWarning.description: Warning message when try to fetch an image and instead get HTML

httpFetchCanRetry.message: This is an intermittent error. Trying again may succeed.
httpFetchCanRetry.description: Added message that retrying HTTP operation may succeed.

htmlFetchFailed.message: Fetch of URL '$url$' failed with network error $err$.
htmlFetchFailed.description: Error message when fetch of a web page fails.

imageFetchFailed.message: Fetch of image '$imageUrl$' for page '$pageUrl$' failed with network error $err$.
imageFetchFailed.description: Error message when fetch of an image file fails.

imgurFetchFailed.message: Warning: Attempt to fetch imgur image(s) '$imageUrl$' for page '$pageUrl$' failed with network error $err$.
imgurFetchFailed.description: Error message when fetch of an image file fails.

noChaptersFound.message: No chapters found. This may not be the novel's detail page.
noChaptersFound.description: Warning message when parser can't find list of chapters.

informationPageTitle.description: Title of page that gives information on epub.

noChaptersFoundAndFetchClicked.description: Warning message.  Developer has clicked 'Fetch Chapters' when there are none.

noImagesFound.description: Warning message.  Developer has clicked 'Fetch Images' when there are none.

noImagesFoundLabel.description: Text put in images table when no images are found.

noParserFound.message: No parser found for this URL.  Default parser will be used.  You will need to specify how to obtain content for each chapter.
noParserFound.description: Warning message when can't figure out how to extract info from web page.

setCover.description: Label for checkboxes used to select the cover image.

tableOfContentsUrl.description: Label on information page for URL where Table of Contents came from.

warningNoVisibleContent.message: Warning, content element for web page '$url$' has no visible content.
warningNoVisibleContent.description: Warning message when content element for a page has nothing viewable

warningWebpImage.message: Warning: image file '$filename$' is in webp format.  Your epub viewer may not be able to render it.
warningWebpImage.description: Warning message when downloaded image is in webp format
